Sonthofen is a s small city with 21,000 citizens which was elected Alpine City 2005

.
thumb
Sonthofen is an excellent base for the further exploration of the
which are located closer to the Alps, but can be reached within 30 minutes by train or car.

there is a train every hour which takes about 2:40 hours to reach Sonthofen. Price is 33,40 €, with Bayern-Ticket: 22 € (Spring 2012).

From

there is a train every hour which takes about 2:45 hours to reach Sonthofen. Price is 35,70 €, with Baden-Württemberg-Ticket: 21 € (Spring 2012).

From
there is a train every hour which takes about 1:05 hours to reach Sonthofen. Price is 14,40 € (Spring 2012).
From north you take the Autobahn until

and then take the B19 until you reach Sonthofen. During peak season there is often traffic jams on the B19. 

From west you take the B308 to Sonthofen. This road passes the Paradies (Lookout Point) and you might need snow chains after heavy snowfall during winter (announced in traffic radio).

value: Egga-Spiel - performed every third year (zuletzt im Jahr 2006) around the end of carnival (late February/early March)
- Pub; Rathausplatz 1; open daily 9.00 until 1.00; on weekend until 3.00.
- Rockcafe; Eichendorfstraße 1, close to the trainstation.
- Disco; Stadionweg 12; Tu 21-4 Uhr; F,Sa 22.00 - 5.00 clock.
- Insiderclub; Music is maily Independent/Alternativ Rock. F,Sa 20.00 - 1.00.
- Independent/Alternative Rock; Marktstrasse 4, basement; 12.00-1.00; Fr & Sa  until 3.00;
- Cocktailbar; Freibadstraße 14; Su-Th 11 AM until 3 PM; Fr-Sa 11AM-4PM.
- Hard and Heavy Bar; Grüntenstraße 39; M-Th 20.00 - 3.00; Sa,Su 20.00 - 5.00.
